title: Keikoku no Shitateya Rose Bertin
original_name: 傾国の仕立て屋 ローズ・ベルタン
sinopse:
18th century France, just before the revolution. The palace of Versailles hosted a dressmaker with more style than even the nobles themselves. This is the story of Rose Bertin, the mother of fashion design and the favorite stylist of Marie Antoinette.

(Source: Shinchosha, translated)
